title: srI naraayaNa vaahanaa
sahitya:
Sri Narayana Vaahana Sritha Muni jana Mandala Paalana



anupallavi



Vinathaa vara thanaya Vedhaanka subhakaaaya

Vivitha vishvaalaya veera maam paalaya



caraNam



Niravathi Kaamala Paraakrama

Nithya Nirmala kala Thurathikrama

Muraripu charanaabja samprama

Muni Narayana Theertha Madhirama

Aravindha lochana Agabandha mochana

Suraripu Saasana Soma Ravi Nayana

Parijana Paalana Paamara vidhalana

Kritha Guru sevana Gokula Paavana
